Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Arizona schools are "dead last" in funding per student, when in fact Utah holds that position.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to back up the statement that Arizona schools rank 45th in the nation.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that ranking 45th in the nation automatically means being "dead last" in funding per student, which is not accurate.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to acknowledge the alternative explanation that Utah is actually the state with the lowest funding per student.
